name: Changjian Chen
content: Changjian - Homepage Changjian Chen College of Computer Science and Electronic Engineering, Hunan University Associate Professor Changsha, China Email Google Scholar I am an associate professor at Hunan University. I received my Ph.D. degree from Tsinghua University, advised by Prof. Shixia Liu. Before that, I received my B.S. in Electronic Engineering from University of Science and Technology of China. My research interest focuses on interactive machine learning, visual analytics, and data-centric AI. ğŸ”¥ News 2025.10: Â ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ One paper about MLLM evaluation on Infographic charts is accepted by NeurIPS. 2025.7: Â ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ One paper about dataset expansion is accepted by ACM MM. 2025.7: Â ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ One paper about intelligent breeding is accepted by IEEE VIS. 2025.4: Â ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ One paper is accepted by IEEE TVCG. 2025.2: Â ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ Awarded the Outstanding Reviewer of CAD&CG. 2025.1: Â ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ One paper is accepted by IEEE PacificVis (Journal Track) 2025. 2024.12: Â ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ One paper is accepted by IEEE TVCG. 2024.9: Â ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ One paper is accepted by ECAI. 2024.9: Â ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ Invited as an Archive Chair for IEEE VIS 2025. 2024.9: Â ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ Invited as a Program Committee member for IEEE PacificVis (Journal Track) 2025. 2024.7: Â ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ Awarded Doctoral Dissertation Award of China Graphics Society. 2024.4: Â ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ One paper is accepted by CAD&CG. 2024.4: Â ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ Invited as a Program Committee member for IEEE VIS 2024. ğŸ“ Publications NeurIPS 2025 InfoChartQA: A Benchmark for Multimodal Question Answering on Infographic Charts Tianchi Xie, Minzhi Lin, Mengchen Liu, Yilin Ye, Changjian Chen, Shixia Liu.
